about-me.paragraph-1: I am a 20 years old Colombian who dreams of becoming a SOFTWARE DEVELOPER.
about-me.paragraph-2: I have a diverse skill set, ranging from the basics of Front-End design with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to backend development with PHP. I am currently studying the basic concepts of Back-End programming with Spring Boot (Java) and Node.js
about-me.paragraph-3: The reason why I am exploring web development is so that I can gain experience in this world called programming. My future ideal is to dedicate myself to the development of Artificial Intelligence.

thank-you.title: Thanks for contacting me.
thank-you.paragraph: Soon I will be answering your request.
